Annotation.Annotation Body: 8 bones surround the brain within the skull. They are the Frontal bone, Occipital bone, Sphenoid bone, Ethmoid bone, two Temporalbones and two Parietal bones.
14 bones constitute the face. They are the Vomer, Mandible (Jawbone), two Maxilla, two Nasal Bones, two Palatine bones, two Lacrimal Bones, two Zygomatic bones, and two interior nasal concha.
